member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_COLLISION_INFORMATION
member.summary: The LSA_FOREST_TRUST_COLLISION_INFORMATION structure contains information about Local Security Authority forest trust collisions.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_COLLISION_INFORMATION.RecordCount
member.summary: Number of structures in the array pointed to by the Entries member.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_COLLISION_INFORMATION.Entries
member.summary: Pointer to a pointer to an array of structures, each of which contains information about a single collision.
